website_summaries.verdict: A small cake pop maker great for use in smaller kitchens or in apartment settings.
pros: Heating element works quickly to get up to the appropriate temperature
Nonstick cooking surface makes cleanup extremely easy after use
cons: The bottoms of the finished cake pops tend to be more cooked or even burnt than the body

customer_reviews.title: I gave it away.
customer_reviews.text: I just sucked at making anything with these, But i had purchased it for a party and i think it was me that didn't use it right. I gave it away to my sister. She likes it.

customer_reviews.title: One Star

customer_reviews.author: CHT

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This machine is Great! I would advise to practice before you actually have to present your Cake Pops. My first two batches didn't turn out as well as I would like, but my 3rd batch and there on were Great! They provide a recipe with the machine that's good, but I also used a cake mix which I liked better (more flavor)! I did have to adjust the eggs and milk from the boxed cake to provide the right consistency.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Moni

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars !
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to clean. Tips : fill the batter with the squeeze bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Fast..easy..fun!
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected..heated up good.. I used a squirt bottle to fill..don't fill too much or you will have a mess. Was easy enough for young ones. Didn't worry about them getting burned. Cakes came out perfectly browned and were easy to frost.. fun project. Would buy as a gift..
customer_reviews.author: Marie B.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE this item.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I've ever made. It cooks the mix so quickly, prefer this over the plastic tray.
customer_reviews.author: Cherilyn H.L. Napihaa

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. I can make so many cake pops in so little time.

customer_reviews.title: I have no problem recommending this to everyone.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this many times since my purchase and I could not be happier. I have used cake mix, muffin mix, pancake mix, and mix from scratch. Everything I try comes out well.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved this. She made three batches; it was very easy to use!

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great machine, works fast. 4 minutes for cake pops to be ready. I made 60 cake pops with one cake box mix

customer_reviews.text: The outside of the pops comes out well but thr inside is still so sodt that the cake pops don't hold together we'll and fall apart when you dip them.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

product_meta.title: Brentwood Cake Pop Maker Non-Stick, 12, Purple
product_meta.description: Use the powerful 750 watt Brentwood TS-254 Non-Stick Cake Pop Maker to bake 12 perfect cake pops in just 4 minutes. Includes recipes for vanilla and lemon cake pops, cinnamon sugar donut holes and pancake bites. Easily slide your cake pops out of the non-stick plates. Power and pre heat indicator lights inform you when the plates are hot and ready. Vertical feet and cable wrap allow the cake pop maker to stand upright for incredibly small storage. For safety, unit will automatically shut off if it senses overheating.
feature_bullets: Powerful 750 watt cake pop maker bakes 12 cake pops in just 4 minutes
Includes recipes for vanilla and lemon cake pops, cinnamon sugar donut holes and pancake bites
Cake pops slide right off of the non-stick plates making cleanup a snap
Cake pop maker safely operate with cool touch handles
Convenient power and pre heat indicator lights

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars113 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars

categories: Electric Cake Pop & Mini Cake Makers
